```{r}
rm(list = ls())
library("tidyverse", quietly = TRUE)
asoiaf <- read.csv2(
  file.path(".", "dta", "asoiaf.csv"), stringsAsFactors = FALSE
)
```




Auswertung multiplikativer Interaktionsterme

```{r generateModel, eval = FALSE}
asoiaf[, "died"] <- !is.na(asoiaf[, "book_of_death"])
fit <- glm(
  died ~ 0 + allegiances +
    gender*nobility +
    age_in_chapters + I(age_in_chapters^2) + I(age_in_chapters^3),
  family = binomial(link = "logit"),
  data = asoiaf
)
summary(asoiaf)
```
